import io from'socket.io-client';const socket=io('http://localhost:5000');// Adjust the URL as needed
const joinRoom=roomId=>{socket.emit('join',roomId);};const sendMessage=(roomId,message)=>{socket.emit('message',{roomId,message});};const onMessage=callback=>{socket.on('message',callback);};const socketService={joinRoom,sendMessage,onMessage};export default socketService;
